plt.subplot(1,2,1)
plt.xticks(rotation=90)
plt.title('Male Top10')
plt.xlabel('Discipline')
plt.ylabel('Male')
plt.bar(male_top10['Discipline'],male_top10['Male'],width=0.8)

plt.subplot(1,2,2)
plt.xticks(rotation=90)
plt.title('Female Top10')

plt.ylabel('Female')
plt.bar(female_top10['Discipline'],female_top10['Female'],width=0.8)

plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()
